mapper.select: SELECT no, rtime, capa, TO_CHAR(regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as dbday, state, place_no, member_id, rdate, parking, price, rep_image,name, num FROM (SELECT no, rtime, capa,regdate, state, place_no, member_id, rdate, parking, price, rep_image,name, rownum as num FROM (SELECT no, rtime, capa,regdate, state, place_no, member_id, rdate, parking, price, rep_image,name FROM reserve_info_3 WHERE member_id=#{member_id} ORDER BY no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT no,rtime,capa,TO_CHAR(regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as dbday, state,place_no,member_id, rdate,parking,rep_image, name, price, member_tel,num FROM (SELECT no,rtime,capa,regdate, state,place_no,member_id, rdate,parking,rep_image, name, price, member_tel,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,rtime,capa,regdate, state,place_no,member_id, rdate,parking,rep_image, reserve_info_3.name as name, price, member_3.tel as member_tel FROM reserve_info_3,member_3 WHERE state=#{type} AND member_id=member_3.id ORDER BY no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
